name: My Mistress Wants Curry So I Will Hunt the Rogue Vegetables
name_original: My Mistress Wants Curry So I Will Hunt the Rogue Vegetables
description:
Vegetables are made to be eaten! You know it, but your peers do not. They run from their duties to become tasty seasonings for the great curry. It is up to you to bring these vegetables to justice by any means necessary! Hack, slash, and hunt vegetables, sending them to their maker, and take on the great Daikon to finish the ingredients. Do not let their screams or pleas for mercy stay your blade. Your mistress will have her curry and no vegetable will escape your wrath. Not even you!

Credits

Omari Straker - Gameplay programmer
Ray Jackson - Gameplay programmer
Christopher Adams - Puni vegetable models, woman model, all character voices
Darrell Atienza - Daikon Boss Model
Mayra Rivera - Animation / Asset
Florence Yuen - UI vegetable icons
